hero.title: HTML Tag memory test
hero.subtitle: How many HTML tags can you remember?

EASY.title: Easy
EASY.info: At this level you start with a 1 minute countdown. Every hit you get 5 seconds in the count.

HARD.title: Hard
HARD.info: At this level you start with a 30 second countdown. Every hit you get 3 seconds in the count.

EXPERT.title: Expert
EXPERT.info: At this level you start with a 15 second countdown. Every hit you get 2 seconds in the count.
